tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE coverage_details (
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    coverage_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    premium_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    coverage_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    coverage_end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE coverage_details (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  coverage_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  coverage_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  coverage_end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE claim_histories (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  coverage_id INT NOT NULL,
  claim_date DATE NOT NULL,
  claim_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE coverage_details (
    coverage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    insurer_id UUID REFERENCES insurers(insurer_id),
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    coverage_amount DECIMAL,
    coverage_start_date DATE,
    coverage_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE premiums (
    premium_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    coverage_id UUID REFERENCES coverage_details(coverage_id),
    premium_amount DECIMAL,
    payment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE claim_histories (
    claim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    coverage_id UUID REFERENCES coverage_details(coverage_id),
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_amount DECIMAL,
    resolved BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE premiums (
    premium_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    premium_amount DECIMAL,
    payment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES coverage_details(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE claim_histories (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES coverage_details(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE coverage_details (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    protocol_name VARCHAR(50),
    coverage_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    coverage_start DATE,
    coverage_end DATE
);

CREATE TABLE premiums (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    protocol_name VARCHAR(50),
    premium_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_date DATE,
    payment_method VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE claim_histories (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    protocol_name VARCHAR(50),
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);
